main: Her defense skill gives her {status:TimeRentalTwoPersonality} which buffs her for the next 3 turns giving her 3, then 2, then 1 stack of {status:Agility}, {status:ParryingResultUp}, and {status:Vulnerable}. On the 4th turn she gets 6 {status:Binding} and 8 {status:Aggro}. This sequence can't be overwritten by defending again, but you can start it again on the 4th turn when she loses the status.

While having {status:TimeRentalTwoPersonality}, her S3 can consume it (cutting the sequence short) to deal additional damage, trigger an additional {status:VibrationExplosion} and apply {status:TimeSuspend}.
Her S2 inflicts {status:Switch_Vibration} into {status:VibrationChainPersonality} if the target isn't already in {status:Switch_Vibration}. Otherwise, it deals more damage.
Her first S3 use gives her {status:OutisNoHat} for the rest of the encounter, giving her more {status:Vibration} Count generation and damage.
other: {status:TimeSuspend} prevents the enemy from receiving damage for 2 turns (the current and the next turn), instead collecting all that damage to deal 130% of that total as {keyword:Sloth} damage at the end of the 2nd turn. You can end the effect and get the burst damage early by applying another instance of {status:TimeSuspend} whether from Outis or from the other T corp. Identities.

{status:VibrationChainPersonality} reduces the enemy's Clash Power by 1 for every 10 {status:Vibration} Potency up to a max of -3, while still working with any other usual effects of {status:Vibration}.
If her target has 10+ {status:Vibration} Potency, her S2 consumes 4 of it to apply 2 Count on herself and the target.
S3 can consume up to 3 {status:Vibration} Potency to gain Count on herself and inflict {status:Binding}. She then consumes all her Count to gain Coin Power and damage on the last coin.

When her passive is active, she gets a free heal if she has 10-20% HP at turn end. This does not work if she dies or drops below 10%. She also gets +1 Final Power if she has {status:TimeRentalTwoPersonality}.

1111301.desc:
Turn End: If this unit's HP is between 10% ~ 20%, instantly heal 80% of this unit's max HP, and recover from Stagger. (once per Encounter)

If this unit has [TimeRentalTwoPersonality], its Skills gain Final Power +1
1111301.name: Golden Time - Microcavity

1111321.desc: 1 ally with the fastest Speed deals +10% damage when attacking a Staggered target.
1111321.name: Expeditious Execution of Official Duties
